sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FaBars, FaTimes, FaGithub, FaLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fa' import { HiOutlineMail } from 'react-icons/hi' import { BsFillPersonLinesFill } from 'react-icons/bs' import MS from "../assets/assets/MS.png" import { Link } from 'react-scroll' export const Navbar = () => { const [nav, setNav] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => setNav(!nav) return (
{/* Menu */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Projects
  • Contact
{/* Hamburger */}
{!nav ? : }
{/* Mobile menu */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Projects
  • Contact
{/* Social icons */}
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • Email
  • Resume
) }
